articles.title: Football Match between DPRK and UAE Held
articles.content:
Football Match between DPRK and UAE Held
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The second football match between the Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the United Arab Emirates, the Asian final preliminary for FIFA 2010 World Cup, was held at Kim Il Sung Stadium in Pyongyang on Mar. 28.
					 The DPRK team beat its rival 2:0.

articles.title: June 15 All-Korean Committee Meets
articles.content:
June 15 All-Korean Committee Meets
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the chairmen of the north, south and overseas sides to All-Korean Committee for Implementation of June 15 Joint Declaration was held here from March 25 to 28.
					 The chairmen at the meeting expressed deep concern over the prevailing grave situation in which the north-south joint declarations that ushered in a new era of independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the nation have been blatantly denied and the north-south relations are inching close to the phase of all-out confrontation and the brink of war.
					
					 The meeting discussed the issues of increasing the role of the above-said committee and reenergizing the movement for implementing the north-south joint declarations to cope with the prevailing situation.
					
					 The chairmen reached a consensus on the need for the committee to strengthen the unity of the forces supporting the June 15 joint declaration at home and abroad and play a leading role in the nation-wide movement for implementing the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 It was stressed at the meeting that dependence on outside forces and sycophantic and treacherous moves should be rejected and the issue of reunification and the internal affairs of the nation should be independently solved by the concerted efforts of the Koreans.
					
					 The meeting agreed to jointly and strongly react against the fascist suppression of the reunification movement organizations grouping people from all walks of life, recognizing that this is an unpardonable anti-reunification act as it throws a big hurdle in the way of implementing the north-south joint declarations.
					
					 It termed the action taken by the south Korean conservative ruling quarters to disallow some members of the south side committee to participate in the meeting an action to stamp out the non-governmental movement for reunification and decided to dynamically wage the struggle against Japan's distortion of history, its attempt to grab Tok Islet and hostile acts against the DPRK and suppression of Koreans in Japan as a joint national movement.
					
					 It also decided to positively conduct joint actions and a solidarity movement together with the political parties, organizations and personages supporting the north-south joint declarations and aspiring after the peace and reunification of the country.
					
					 It was agreed at the meeting to set the period from June 15, the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration, to October 4 as "the period of the movement for implementing the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration" and wage diverse and intensive mass movements for defending and implementing the north-south joint declarations during the period for the purpose of giving momentum to the atmosphere of supporting the joint declarations.

articles.title: Sowing on Cold-beds for Rice Seedlings Starts in Countryside
articles.content:
Sowing on Cold-beds for Rice Seedlings Starts in Countryside
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Sowing on cold-beds for rice seedlings started in the countryside of the DPRK except the northern alpine areas.
					 The Kumsong and Chujong Cooperative Farms in Paechon County and cooperative farms in Haeju City, Jangyon, Ongjin and Kangryong Counties of South Hwanghae Province are carrying out their daily quotas for sprouting seeds and all other processes without fail as required by the Juche methods of farming.
					
					 Seeds were sown on many cold-beds for rice seedlings in the countryside of North Hwanghae Province for several days and sowing is making brisk headway in the rural areas in North and South Phyongan provinces and on the East Coast.

articles.title: Historic Meeting for Victory in Advance into Homeland
articles.content:
Historic Meeting for Victory in Advance into Homeland
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Seventy-two years have elapsed since President Kim Il Sung put forth the policy of advancing into the homeland with large forces at the Xigang meeting in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 Entering 1937, the Japanese imperialists stepped up the fascist repression and plunder of the Korean people as never before, clamoring loudly about "oneness of Japan and Korea" and "the Japanese and the Koreans are of the same ancestry" and resorted to vicious moves to hold in check the advance of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) into the homeland.
					
					 The President, with a scientific penetration into the prevailing situation, convened a meeting of military and political cadres of the KPRA in Xigang, Fusong County on March 29, Juche 26 (1937), at which he delivered the historic speech "Let Us Inspire the People with Hopes of National Liberation by Advancing with Large Forces into the Homeland."
					
					 The advance of KPRA large units into the homeland was of great significance in making the people turn out vigorously in the sacred war to liberate the country, full of joy and confidence in victory that they had the revolutionary army to defeat the Japanese imperialists and win the independence of Korea.
					
					 This was the strategic intention of the President consistent with the operation to advance into the homeland.
					
					 In the speech he indicated the direction of each unit's activities for the advance.
					
					 He ordered the main unit to march into the Hyesan district across the Amnok River, a strongpoint of frontier guards of the Japanese imperialists, a unit to skirt round Mt. Paektu and advance into the northern border area along the Tuman River via Antu and Helong and a unit to advance into the Linjiang and Changbai areas along the Amnok River.
					
					 He stressed that the immediate task for the successful advance into the homeland was to prepare the members of the KPRA politically and ideologically and, at the same time, make full combat preparations.
					
					 The policy served as an important guideline for successful advance into the homeland and was of weighty significance in expanding the anti-Japanese armed struggle deep into the homeland.
					
					 The main unit led by the President advanced into the homeland and waged the Pochonbo battle, dealing a telling political and military blow to the Japanese imperialist aggressors. The battle implanted in the minds of the Korean people the confidence in the national liberation and the faith in the victory and forcefully aroused them to the anti-Japanese warfare.

articles.title: Words of Eternal Value
articles.content:
Words of Eternal Value
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Monumental words are inscribed in the famous mountains of Korea to hand down the greatness and immortal feats of the Three Commanders of Mt. Paektu.
					 Incised on a natural rock of Sangwondong in Mt. Myohyang is a famous poem "Mt. Myohyang on an Autumn Day". The poem was recited by President Kim Il Sung on October 15, Juche 68 (1979) when he visited the International Friendship Exhibition House. It instills national pride into the minds of the army and people of the DPRK.
					
					 There are natural rocks of Mt. Myohyang on which the words "Iron-willed Brilliant Commander Kim Jong Il" and "Brilliant Commander of Songun General Kim Jong Il, February 16, Juche 96" are carved.
					
					 Extra-large sized words reading "Illustrious Commander General Kim Jong Il, February 16, Juche 91" are inscribed on a natural rock of Pari Peak in the Sujong Peak area of Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 Each letter of his august name is 34 meters in height, 25 meters in width and 1.5 meters in depth.
					
					 Seen in the mountain are natural rocks with such words as "Anti-Japanese Heroine Kim Jong Suk" and "Long Live the Great Songun Politics! December 24, Juche 89".
					
					 Natural rocks in Mt. Suyang in Haeju City of South Hwanghae Province are inscribed with the streamer "The Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung Will Always Be with Us. October 10, Juche 87", flanked by immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung", and with words "Illustrious Commander General Kim Jong Il Inscribed on October 8, Juche 88" and "Long Live the Great Songun Politics! April 25, Juche 91". 
					
					 Engraved on rocks in Mt. Kuwol, in Phyongji-ri of Maengsan County, South Phyongan Province and Pansok-ri of Cholwon County, Kangwon Province are words lauding Kim Jong Il as a legendary hero, peerlessly brilliant commander and the sun of the 21st century.
					
					 The words incised on natural rocks of famous mountains are the precious ideological and cultural treasures reflecting the unstinted praise of the army and people of Korea for the greatness and revolutionary exploits of the great men and woman of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Korean People Strive for Tomorrow
articles.content:
Korean People Strive for Tomorrow
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- It is a proud tradition of the Korean people to devote themselves to the better morrow and to the rising generation.
					 The anti-Japanese revolutionary fighters, the first generation of the Korean revolution, had shed their blood in the anti-Japanese war to win back the country occupied by the Japanese imperialists, shouting "The victory of the revolution is seen" and "Long live national liberation!"
					
					 Lots of people had laid down their lives without hesitation for the hopeful future and the country during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 In the postwar period of rehabilitation and construction, too, the Korean people did away with the war debris only in a few years and upgraded its appearance only within 14 years, demonstrating the stamina of heroic Korea to the world, although the U.S. imperialists prattled that the DPRK would be unable to get back on its feet even in 100 years.
					
					 They also successfully wound up "the Arduous March" and forced march by working hard with confidence and optimism under the slogan "Let us go the thorny path cheerfully!"
					
					 Now the looks of the country are being changed day after day by the efforts of soldiers and people who are carrying out the projects of factory and land construction for the future in a big and bold way.
					
					 The land management has been pushed forward vigorously, with the result that mountains are covered with wood, and the farmland is rezoned and medium and small gravity-fed waterways have come into being in different parts of the country with the Kaechon-Thaesong Lake Waterway and Paekma-Cholsan Waterway as a model as required by the new century.
					
					 Large power bases have been constructed in Anbyon, Thaechon, Samsu, Nyongwon and other areas as well as a lot of minor ones across the country to increase the nation's electricity production.
					
					 Such famous mountains as Mts.Kuwol, Chilbo, Paekun and Ryongak have been arranged into recreation grounds for the people. Modern stock-breeding farms are being built one after another.
					
					 Today the Korean people are making a new revolutionary upsurge for the construction of a thriving nation under the slogan "Let us live not merely for today but for tomorrow!"

articles.title: Bolstering of Revolutionary Armed Forces Called for
articles.content:
Bolstering of Revolutionary Armed Forces Called for
 Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- The protection of sovereignty and right to existence of each country and nation depends on their own strength, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 If a country and a nation are to protect their sovereignty and the right to existence they should bolster up the defence capability.  Without one's own strength, strong military muscle for self-defence it is impossible to win in the fight against imperialism nor is it possible to defend the country and the nation and the security of its people.
					
					 The policy of the DPRK on national defence is a policy on self-defence from A to Z.
					
					 The national defence forces of the DPRK, the forces for self-defence, have the mission to protect the country and socialism and the security of its people and their lives and properties.
					
					 The right to self-defence is the life and soul of the DPRK and Korean-style socialism is the life and soul of the Korean people. It is the steadfast will of the Korean people to defend and advance Korean-style socialism and to do so is the exercise of the right to self-determination of the Korean nation and the right to choice recognized by the United Nations.
					
					 The only way for the DPRK is to bolster up the nation's defence capability by its own efforts.
					
					 Songun serves as a banner for the DPRK having a long-standing tradition to win sure victories.
					
					 The Songun politics of the DPRK serves as an ever-victorious banner for the country and the revolution and an all-powerful treasured sword for the revolution and construction as it is based on the Juche idea and comprehensively embodies and consummates the Juche-oriented revolutionary principles, strategies and tactics, Juche-based leadership methods and art.
					
					 The DPRK is proud of having averted a war on the Korean Peninsula up to this date by firmly protecting the sovereignty of the country and socialism from the imperialists' desperate moves to isolate and stifle it.
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will creditably discharge their mission and role in preventing a war and defending the sovereignty and peace of the country.

articles.title: WPK and Korean People's Struggle Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
WPK and Korean People's Struggle Supported in Mexico
Pyongyang, March 28 (KCNA) -- Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, on Mar. 17 met the delegation of the Workers' Party of Korea which was on a visit to Mexico to participate in the 13th seminar of world political parties on building a new society.
					 He expressed belief that the WPK and the Korean people would successfully build a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The U.S. and the anti-reunification forces of south Korea are running amuck to ignite a new war on the Korean Peninsula, but the reunification of Korea is sure to be achieved, he said, adding: The People's Socialist Party of Mexico will positively support the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle to defend the socialist cause in the future, too.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Carbonifero de la Region de Anju
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige el Complejo Carbonifero de la Region de Anju
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio en el terreno el Complejo Carbonifero de la Region de Anju.
					 Ante todo, el recorrio el monumento a la orientacion sobre el terreno del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el museo de la historia revolucionaria.
					
					 Bajo la sabia direccion y esmerada atencion del Presidente, el complejo se ha convertido en una base productora de carbon de gran tamano, recordo y prosiguio que las inmortales hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente brillaran eternamente junto con las cuencas carboneras.
					
					 Tras escuchar explicaciones ante el plano del desarrollo de minas carboniferas, recorrio varios lugares de esa empresa como el campo de extraccion de la Mina de Carbon Hwaphung averiguando en detalles los preparativos para la revitalizacion de produccion, el plan perspectivo del desarrollo y el estado de produccion.
					
					 Presento las tareas programaticas, que serviran de guia para el desarrollo con vistas al futuro de las minas de carbon, calificando de muy importantes el deber y el papel del citado complejo encargado de buena parte de la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					 Senalo que la tarea prioritaria de esta empresa es ultimar en un corto plazo los preparativos para aumentar trascendentalmente la produccion carbonifera.
					
					 A fin de dinamizar la produccion de carbon y ampliar constantemente la capacidad productiva, es preciso realizar enormes trabajos como el ordenamiento de los campos de extraccion, enseno y aclaro el rumbo y los remedios para el particular.
					
					 Indico las tareas que debe cumplir el complejo destacando que depende en mayor parte de esta empresa el cubrimiento satisfactorio o no de la creciente demanda sobre el carbon.
					
					 Asevero que el problema mas importante para lograr un salto en la produccion carbonifera es llevar a cabo en un alto nivel la modernizacion y la fundamentacion cientifica de las minas hulleras.
					
					 Encomendo al Consejo de Ministros, ministerios y organos centrales que ayuden y respalden activamente al complejo resaltando la necesidad de reforzar la asistencia estatal para terminar en breve la colosal obra de reconstruccion tecnologica de esta empresa.
					
					 Para producir aqui mucho mas carbon de buena calidad, es necesario impulsar la modernizacion de los campos de extraccion y, al mismo tiempo, intensificar la investigacion cientifica de la rama, apunto.
					
					 Por ultimo, expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los carboneros de Anju seran dignos participantes y ameritados en la gran batalla para construir una gran potencia prospera al marchar a galopes al frente de la lucha por producir un nuevo y gran auge revolucionario marcando el paso con los productores de acero de Kangson (del Complejo de Acero Chollima).
					
					 El Dirigente fue acompanado en esta ocasion por el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas de Kusong
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas de Kusong
 Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno la Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas de Kusong.
					 Tras escuchar explicaciones sobre la modernizacion de la fabrica, el Dirigente paso revista a varios procesos productivos como el taller de ensamblaje y a las nuevas maquinas herramientas cerciorandose en detalles de la marcha de renovacion tecnologica y modernizacion y del estado de produccion.
					
					 Al averiguar concretamente las especificaciones, la estructura y los principios de funcionamiento de las maquinas herramientas disenadas y fabricadas nuevamente, aprecio altamente los meritos de los obreros de la fabrica mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos producen mucha cantidad de magnificas maquinas de ese tipo, que satisfacen las exigencias del nuevo siglo, dedicando toda su inteligencia y pasion.
					
					 Gracias a la lucha abnegada de los funcionarios, los obreros y los tecnicos de la fabrica, se renovo radicalmente el perfil de ella en unos anos, dijo.
					
					 La Fabrica de Maquinas Herramientas de Kusong, donde todos los procesos productivos fueron modernizados en un alto nivel sobre la base cientifica y es asegurada al maximo la cultura de produccion y de vida, es la ejemplar de la epoca del Songun (priorizacion militar) en que fue llevado a la realidad nuestro ideal, subrayo.
					
					 Es posible terminar con exito en un corto plazo la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de la economia nacional y cumplir con adelanto la causa de construccion de una gran potencia prospera si luchamos tenazmente poniendo en el primer lugar el desarrollo cientifico-tecnico como los obreros de aqui, subrayo y agrego que todos los sectores y unidades deben seguir el ejemplo de ellos.
					
					 Presento las tareas programaticas que tiene por delante la fabrica destacando que ella ocupa una posicion importante en el desarrollo economico del pais.
					
					 En estos tiempos, en que se libra dinamicamente la batalla para la construccion de una gran potencia prospera, son mas demandadas que nunca las maquinas herramientas, senalo y anadio que la fabrica debe producir y suministrar mucha cantidad de modernas maquinas herramientas necesarias a varios sectores de la economia nacional.
					
					 Dado que la maquina herramienta es el importante medio que constituye lo clave de la revolucion de maquinaria, es indispensable elevar constantemente la calidad de este producto, senalo y agrego que para este fin, hay que seguir concentrando las fuerzas en la produccion de maquinas herramientas de alta velocidad, precision y modernizadas.
					
					 Expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros de la fabrica cumpliran magnificamente su honrosa mision de precursor y vanguardia en el desarrollo cientifico-tecnico al proponerse la clara meta perspectiva para situar en un plano mas alto la industria de maquinaria y al luchar tenazmente por alcanzarla.
					
					 Acompanaron al Dirigente en esta ocasion el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, Kim Phyong Hae, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, y los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Pak Nam Gi y Jang Song Thaek.

articles.title: Partido de futbol entre equipos de RPDC y de Emiratos Arabes Unidos
articles.content:
Partido de futbol entre equipos de RPDC y de Emiratos Arabes Unidos 
Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 28 en el capitalino Estadio Kim Il Sung el segundo partido de futbol entre el equipo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el de Emiratos Arabes Unidos, que salieron a la etapa final de las clasificatorias de la region asiatica para ganar boletos a la Copa Mundial de 2010 de la FIFA.
					En esta competencia el equipo coreano gano al equipo visitante por 2 a 0.

articles.title: Reunion de comite conjunto nacional del 15 de junio
articles.content:
Reunion de comite conjunto nacional del 15 de junio
 Pyongyang, 28 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 25 al 28 en esta capital la reunion de los presidentes de los comites norteno y sureno de Corea y ultramarino para la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio (comite conjunto nacional del 15 de junio).
					  En la ocasion los presidentes expresaron la profunda preocupacion sobre la grave situacion de hoy en que se niegan abiertamente las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur que abrieron la nueva era de la reunificacion independiente, la paz y la prosperidad de la nacion y las relaciones N-S se llevan al enfrentamiento total y al borde de la guerra.
					
					  En la reunion fueron discutidos los problemas de fortalecer el papel del comite conjunto nacional del 15 de junio y de activar el movimiento por la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur haciendo frente a la actual situacion dada.
					
					  Los presidentes llegaron a la identidad de criterios de que el comite conjunto nacional del 15 de junio debe fortalecer la unidad de las fuerzas de apoyo a la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio en el interior y el exterior del pais y hacer el rol principal en el movimiento pannacional por la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.
					
					  La reunion subrayo la necesidad de rechazar la dependencia a las fuerzas extranjeras y las maniobras serviles a grandes potencias y resolver de manera independiente con las fuerzas unidas de la nacion coreana el problema de la reunificacion y otros asuntos internos.
					
					  Reconocio que la represion fascista contra las entidades de movimiento por la reunificacion de distintos sectores es el imperdonable acto anti-reunificacion que crea graves obstaculos en la ejecucion de las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y decidio responder en comun al respecto. 
					
					  En particular, estigmatizo el hecho de que las fuerzas conservadoras gobernantes del Sur de Corea interrumpieron la participacion de los algunos miembros del comite sureno del 15 de junio en dicha reunion, como el acto tendente a exterminar el movimiento civil por la reunificacion.
					
					  Decidio desarrollar en escala nacional la lucha contra la tergiversacion de la historia de Japon, su intento de usurpar la isla Tok, acto hostil a la RPDC y represion contra los coreanos residentes en Japon.
					
					  Tambien decidio desplegar activamente la accion conjunta y el movimiento solidario junto con los partidos politicos, las entidades y las personalidades que apoyan las declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur y desean la paz y la reunificacion del pais.
					
					  Por ultimo, para aumentar el ambiente de apoyo a las declaraciones conjuntas intercoreanas, la reunion definio desde el 15 de junio en que se celebrara el 9 aniversario de la publicacion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio hasta el 4 de octubre como el "periodo del movimiento por la ejecucion de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre" y decidio librar de modo mas concentrado en este periodo variados movimientos masivos por mantener y ejecutar dichas declaraciones conjuntas Norte-Sur.
